short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Parroto uses AI to extract and sort English words from YouTube videos by frequency, helping you learn and improve your vocabulary.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Parroto leverages the power of artificial intelligence to help you effectively study English. It identifies and organizes words by frequency, allowing you to focus on the areas that matter most to you. With its AI-driven approach, Parroto ensures personalized, efficient learning tailored to your interests and goals.
